ModMetadata.Name: ExampleMod
ModMetadata.Author: Example
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]ExampleMod[/h1]
Installation: Subscribe the workshop item and make sure that BepInEx and StationeersLaunchpad are installed. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad
This ExampleMod is a starting point for modders and not meant to be published as-is.
ModMetadata.InGameDescription:
<size="30"><color=#ffa500> ExamplePatchMod </color></size> Installation: Subscribe the workshop item and make sure that BepInEx and StationeersLaunchpad are installed. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad
This ExampleMod is a starting point for modders and not meant to be published as-is.
